game.name: Mina
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Reality is breaking. A psychiatrist begins to doubt. An old friend pulls you into an adventure. Together you push past the lies of the simulation and chase the truth. Will you find freedom or be lost inside a code?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Reality is breaking. A psychiatrist begins to doubt. An old friend pulls you into an adventure. Together you push past the lies of the simulation and chase the truth. Will you find freedom or be lost inside a code?
